techmeme.title: Blackbird Labs, which makes a blockchain-based payment loyalty app for restaurants, raised $50M led by Spark Capital, taking its total funding to $85M (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
Amazon launches Nova Sonic, an AI voice model to generate natural-sounding speech that it says is "the most cost-efficient" model on the market, via Bedrock (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
Google says all new Google TV devices in the US must now have a remote with a Free TV or Live TV button that opens its Freeplay library of 150+ FAST channels (Mishaal Rahman/Android Authority)
Sources: Micron has told US customers that it plans to impose a surcharge on some products like SSDs from April 9 to account for President Trump's tariffs (Reuters)
Internal memo: the US DOJ disbands the National Cryptocurrency Enforcement Unit, established by Biden in 2021, as the agency is "not a digital assets regulator" (Ben Weiss/Fortune)
